name: SKWarpGeometryGrid
desc: A definition for a grid-based deformation of nodes that conform to SKWarpable.

items.name: init(columns: Int, rows: Int)
items.desc: Creates a warp geometry grid of a specified size.

items.name: init(columns: Int, rows: Int, sourcePositions: [SIMD2<Float>], destinationPositions: [SIMD2<Float>])
items.desc: Creates a warp geometry grid of a specific size and warp translation, in point arrays.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Tells you when to intialize a grid that was loaded from an archive.

items.name: var vertexCount: Int
items.desc: The object's total number of vertices.

items.name: func destPosition(at: Int) -> vector_float2
items.desc: Returns the destination position of a vertex.

items.name: func replacingByDestinationPositions(positions: [SIMD2<Float>]) -> SKWarpGeometryGrid
items.desc: Returns a copy of this grid, updated with the argument destination positions.

items.name: func replacingBySourcePositions(positions: [SIMD2<Float>]) -> SKWarpGeometryGrid
items.desc: Returns a copy of this grid, updated with the argument source positions.

items.name: func sourcePosition(at: Int) -> vector_float2
items.desc: Returns the source position of a vertex.
